label: fal-ai/SeeDance 1.0 lite i2v
referenceNotes: Input image is required; uploads over 8MB are auto-resized.
Optional end_image_url keeps the final pose fixed when provided.
Set camera_fixed to true to suppress camera motion.

label: fal-ai/SeeDance 1.0 lite reference
referenceNotes: Provide 1-4 reference images; larger uploads are auto-resized below 8MB.
Prompt can stay empty for pure reenactment, but short motion cues improve results.
Enable camera_fixed to lock framing; leave off to allow automatic camera movement.

label: fal-ai/SeeDance 1.0 lite t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt is required; keep descriptions focused on subject, motion, and style.
Choose duration between 3-12 seconds—longer clips take noticeably longer to render.
Toggle camera_fixed when you need a static shot; default behaviour allows pans and dolly moves.

label: fal-ai/SeeDance 1.0 pro i2v
referenceNotes: Input Image is mandatory; high-resolution uploads over 8MB are compressed automatically.
1080p delivers the sharpest output but takes longest; drop to 720p if the queue is busy.
Use camera_fixed for locked shots; disable it to let the model introduce camera motion.

label: fal-ai/SeeDance 1.0 pro t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt should outline subject, motion, and camera notes for best fidelity.
Durations above 8 seconds queue more slowly; start with 5 seconds for quick previews.
Switch aspect_ratio to match the delivery platform—16:9 fits widescreen, 9:16 fits vertical.

label: fal-ai/hailuo-02 std t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt is compulsory and works best with concise, action-driven language.
Duration presets (6 s / 10 s) trade render time for longer motion.
Disable prompt_optimizer if you need the exact text without Minimax adjustments.

label: fal-ai/hailuo-02 std i2v
referenceNotes: Upload a single Input Image; files above 8MB are automatically downscaled.
Use 768P when you need maximum detail; pick 512P for faster previews.
Toggle prompt_optimizer off to avoid automatic prompt rewrites.

label: fal-ai/hailuo-02 fast i2v
referenceNotes: Requires an Input Image; drag, drop, or paste it—files over 8MB are auto-resized.
Fast variant prioritises turnaround over fidelity, so expect softer fine detail.
Leave prompt_optimizer on for balanced edits, or disable it for literal guidance.

label: fal-ai/hailuo-02 pro t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt is required and supports detailed cinematic direction.
Pro tier delivers richer motion but may queue longer than the standard model.
Keep prompt_optimizer enabled to benefit from Minimax tuning unless verbatim text is critical.

label: fal-ai/hailuo-02 pro i2v
referenceNotes: Input Image is required; optional end_image_url locks the final pose, and uploads above 8MB are compressed automatically.
Pro tier preserves fine detail better but takes longer to complete.
Toggle prompt_optimizer depending on whether you want literal versus assisted prompts.

label: fal-ai/Kling 2.5 turbo pro t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt must cover subject, motion, and camera cues for consistent output.
Duration options (5 s / 10 s) balance clip length against queue time.
Adjust CFG Scale (0-1) to control guidance strength; default 0.5 is a good starting point.

label: fal-ai/Kling 2.5 turbo pro i2v
referenceNotes: Provide an Input Image; uploads over 8MB are resized before submission.
CFG Scale increases adherence to the prompt—raise it if edits feel too loose.
Negative Prompt is optional but effective for excluding unwanted artefacts.

label: fal-ai/Wan2.5 preview t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt accepts up to 800 characters; lead with the most important directives.
Resolution defaults to 1080p; choose 720p or 480p for quicker turnaround.
Disable Enable Prompt Expansion when you need literal adherence to your instructions.

label: fal-ai/Wan2.5 preview i2v
referenceNotes: Attach an Input Image (over 8MB is auto-resized); prompts still steer motion, lighting, and effects.
Select 5 s or 10 s duration—longer clips extend processing time.
Toggle Enable Prompt Expansion off to avoid automatic prompt embellishments.

label: fal-ai/google nano-banana t2i
referenceNotes: Prompt is mandatory and should describe subject, style, and lighting succinctly.
Generate up to four images per run via Number of Images; more outputs take longer.
Choose png output for lossless results; jpeg is quicker and lighter for sharing.

label: fal-ai/qwen-image-edit-plus
referenceNotes: Upload up to three Images; each file above 8MB is automatically downscaled.
Pick an Image Size preset that matches your target aspect ratio.
Use the prompt to describe desired edits; omit it for minor touch-ups.

label: fal-ai/esrgan upscaler
referenceNotes: Input Image is required; sources above 8MB are downscaled before processing.
Scale ranges from 1x to 8x—higher factors increase processing time.
Enable Face to prioritise portrait restoration when needed.

label: fal-ai/minimax speech-2.5-hd
referenceNotes: Text input is required and can include multi-sentence scripts.
Select a voice_id preset to switch between available Japanese voices.
Speed, vol, and pitch fine-tune delivery; keep values near defaults for natural speech.

label: elevenlabs/multilingual_v2
referenceNotes: Enter the narration under text; Japanese, English, and other supported languages are auto-detected.
Pick a voice_id to switch presets; ElevenLabs requires a valid API key via the Settings page.
Stability, similarity boost, style, speaker boost, and speed map directly to voice_settings; adjust in 0.05 steps for fine control.

label: elevenlabs/eleven_v3
referenceNotes: Enter the narration under text; Japanese, English, and other supported languages are auto-detected.
Pick a voice_id to switch presets; ElevenLabs requires a valid API key via the Settings page.
Stability, similarity boost, style, speaker boost, and speed map directly to voice_settings; adjust in 0.05 steps for fine control.

label: fal-ai/pixverse lipsync
referenceNotes: Upload a video file (MP4 recommended); it will be encoded to base64 before submission.
Upload an audio file (MP3 recommended); the lip sync output will align to this track.
Public URLs are still accepted, but local uploads no longer require external hosting.

label: fal-ai/sora-2 t2v
referenceNotes: Prompt text is required; an optional api_key lets you route costs to your own OpenAI account as noted in the fal.ai docs.
duration only accepts 4, 8, or 12 second clips and should be sent as a numeric value.
resolution is fixed at 720p and aspect_ratio must be either 16:9 (default) or 9:16.

label: fal-ai/sora-2 i2v
referenceNotes: Provide image_url as a publicly reachable URL or data URI; it is required and becomes the first frame.
duration is limited to 4, 8, or 12 seconds and should be sent as a number.
resolution supports auto or 720p, while aspect_ratio can be auto, 16:9, or 9:16.

label: fal-ai/sora-2 t2v pro
referenceNotes: Prompt text is required; include api_key when you want OpenAI to bill the request directly.
duration accepts 4, 8, or 12 seconds and must be numeric.
resolution offers 720p or 1080p (default) and aspect_ratio allows 16:9 or 9:16.

label: fal-ai/sora-2 i2v pro
referenceNotes: image_url must point to the starting frame (public URL or data URI) alongside your prompt.
duration remains constrained to 4, 8, or 12 seconds and should be provided as a number.
resolution can be auto, 720p, or 1080p, and aspect_ratio supports auto, 16:9, or 9:16.

label: fal-ai/reve t2i
referenceNotes: Prompt is required; describe subject, style, and lighting succinctly.
Aspect ratio defaults to 3:2; choose from seven presets to match your composition.
Generate up to four images per run; more outputs increase processing time.

label: fal-ai/reve edit
referenceNotes: Input Image is required; uploads over 10MB are auto-resized.
Prompt describes how to edit the provided image.
Generate up to four edited variations per request.

label: fal-ai/reve fast edit
referenceNotes: Input Image is required; fast model prioritizes speed over detail.
Prompt describes the desired edits to apply to the image.
Generate up to four variations; faster turnaround than standard edit model.

label: fal-ai/reve remix
referenceNotes: Provide 1-6 reference images; each must be less than 10MB.
Prompt can include XML img tags like 0 to refer to specific images by index.
Aspect ratio can be omitted for smart auto-selection by the model.

label: fal-ai/reve fast remix
referenceNotes: Upload 1-6 reference images; fast model prioritizes speed over detail.
Use XML img tags in prompt to reference specific images by their position.
Faster processing than standard remix model with similar capabilities.

label: fal-ai/nano-banana-pro t2i
referenceNotes: Prompt is required; powered by Gemini 3 Pro Image for high-quality text-to-image generation.
Resolution options: 1K (default), 2K, or 4K—higher resolutions take longer to render.
Ten aspect ratio presets available; 1:1 is the default.

label: fal-ai/nano-banana-pro edit
referenceNotes: Provide one or more reference images via image_urls for image-to-image editing.
Prompt describes the editing instructions; powered by Gemini 3 Pro Image.
Aspect ratio defaults to auto; resolution offers 1K, 2K, or 4K options.

label: fal-ai/Kling O1 i2v
referenceNotes: Start Image is required and becomes the first frame of the video.
Optional End Image creates a smooth transition between the two frames.
Use @Image1 to reference start frame and @Image2 to reference end frame in prompt.

label: fal-ai/Kling O1 ref2v
referenceNotes: Provide reference images for style/appearance; reference in prompt as @Image1, @Image2, etc.
Add elements (characters/objects) to include in video; reference in prompt as @Element1, @Element2, etc.
Maximum 7 total items (elements + reference images).

label: fal-ai/Kling O1 v2v edit
referenceNotes: Upload a video file (MP4/MOV, 3-10 seconds, max 200MB).
Use @Element1, @Element2 to reference elements and @Image1, @Image2 to reference images in prompt.
Maximum 4 total items (elements + reference images) when using video.

label: fal-ai/Kling O1 v2v ref
referenceNotes: Upload reference video (MP4/MOV, 3-10 seconds, max 200MB) to generate new video based on it.
Use @Element1, @Element2 to reference elements and @Image1, @Image2 to reference images.
Aspect ratio can be auto-detected from input video or manually specified.

label: fal-ai/Seedream 4.5 edit
referenceNotes: Upload 1-10 input images to edit based on your prompt.
Reference images in your prompt as 'Figure 1', 'Figure 2', etc.
Total images (input + output) must not exceed 15.

label: fal-ai/Seedream 4.5 t2i
referenceNotes: Generate images from text prompts using Bytedance's Seedream 4.5 model.
Supports various aspect ratios and resolutions up to 4K.
Total images generated will be between num_images and max_images*num_images.

label: fal-ai/Kling v2.6 pro i2v
referenceNotes: Generate video from an input image using Kling v2.6 pro model.
Supports 5 or 10 second durations with multiple aspect ratios.
Enable 'Generate Audio' for AI-generated Chinese and English voice output.
Default negative prompt: 'blur, distort, and low quality'.

label: fal-ai/Kling v2.6 pro t2v
referenceNotes: Generate video from text prompt using Kling v2.6 pro model.
Supports 5 or 10 second durations with multiple aspect ratios.
Enable 'Generate Audio' for AI-generated Chinese and English voice output.
Default negative prompt: 'blur, distort, and low quality'.

label: fal-ai/Pixverse v5.5 i2v
referenceNotes: Generate video from input image using Pixverse v5.5 model.
Supports various resolutions (360p-1080p) and durations (5-10 seconds).
Enable 'Generate Audio' for BGM, sound effects, and dialogue.
Multi-clip mode creates dynamic camera angle changes.
Thinking type optimizes prompts automatically when enabled.

label: fal-ai/Pixverse v5.5 t2v
referenceNotes: Generate video from text prompt using Pixverse v5.5 model.
Supports various resolutions (360p-1080p) and durations (5-10 seconds).
Enable 'Generate Audio' for BGM, sound effects, and dialogue.
Multi-clip mode creates dynamic camera angle changes.
Thinking type optimizes prompts automatically when enabled.
